sentences.en: "Now give me some account of your voyage." — "Very good, sir."
sentences.cn: “现在给我讲述一下你的航程吧。”——“非常乐意，先生。”

sentences.en: a voyage in space
sentences.cn: 航天

sentences.en: Goodbye! Bon voyage!
sentences.cn: 再见！一路顺风！

sentences.en: He made his will preparatory to his voyage.
sentences.cn: 他在出航前立下了遗嘱

sentences.en: I don’t want to make the voyage single-handed.
sentences.cn: 我不想独自航行。

sentences.en: It is a prosperous voyage to the ship.
sentences.cn: 这是那艘船的一次成功的航行.

sentences.en: Life is compared to a voyage.
sentences.cn: 人生好比航海.

sentences.en: On this account we should be more cautious on this voyage.
sentences.cn: 以此,我们应该在这次航行中格外小心谨慎.

sentences.en: The captain needs a select crew for this dangerous voyage.
sentences.cn: 船长需要一批精选的水手来作此危险的航行.

sentences.en: The comparison of her life to a sea voyage simplifies her experience.
sentences.cn: 把她的人生比作一次海上航行不足以说明她丰富的经历。

sentences.en: The December weather favoured our voyage.
sentences.cn: 12月的天气使我们的航行顺利.

sentences.en: the quincentenary of Columbus's voyage to America
sentences.cn: 哥伦布航海到达美洲的500周年纪念日

sentences.en: The seamen equipped a ship for a voyage.
sentences.cn: 水手们装备船只准备出航.

sentences.en: the Titanic’s maiden voyage
sentences.cn: “泰坦尼克”号的首航

sentences.en: the Titanic’s maiden voyage
sentences.cn: “泰坦尼克”号的首航

sentences.en: The voyage from England to India used to take six months.
sentences.cn: 过去从英格兰到印度要航行六个月。

sentences.en: The voyage is nearly over.
sentences.cn: 航行即将结束。

sentences.en: These are the voyages of the starship Enterprise.
sentences.cn: 这些就是“企业”号星舰几次航行的经历。

sentences.en: This voyage was his first taste of freedom.
sentences.cn: 这次航行使他初次体验到了自由的滋味。

sentences.en: We set out on this voyage of exploration with an open mind.
sentences.cn: 我们以开放的心态开始了这次探索之旅。

words.tran_cn: 航行；[水运][航]航程；旅行记

phrases.tran_cn: 程租船；计程包船；航程佣船

trans.tran_en: a long journey in a ship or spacecraft

trans.tran_cn: 旅行， 航行， 飞行
trans.tran_en: a long journey in a ship or spacecraft
a long journey in a ship or spacecraft
to travel to a place, especially by ship
